name: Stylized Underwater Creatures
description:
The Stylized Underwater Creatures Package gives you wonderful and optimized stylized models, from small fish to big ones, perfect for stylized underwater scenes and games. 

Supported render pipelines: 

- Built-In (Models & Shader) 
- URP (Models only) - HDRP (Models only) 

Package contains: Models:
- 19 stylized underwater creatures with swim animations (482 - 1396 tris)
- 25 stylized corals (18 - 1162 tris) 

Textures:
- 5 underwater creatures (2048x2048)
- 8 underwater corals (2048x2048)
- 1 LUT - 2 toon ramps
- 1 sea floor
- 2 VFX 

Prefabs:
- 19 stylized underwater creatures with animators
- 50 stylized corals
- 3 VFX 

Shader: 
- Toon Shader 

FX: 
- Dust Motes
- Light shafts
- Bubbles
